DOC.brief_title: Phase IIb Study STA-2 Patients With Chronic Stable Angina
DOC.detailed_description: The objective study evaluate dose-response three different dose level STA-2 ( 900 mg daily , 1800 mg daily 2700 mg daily 42 day ) versus placebo patient chronic stable angina . Treatment Group A : 150 mg STA-2 , 2 capsule t.i.d. , meal ( 900 mg STA-2 total dose per day ) Treatment Group B : 300 mg STA-2 , 2 capsule t.i.d. , meal ( 1800 mg STA-2 total dose per day ) Treatment Group C : 450 mg STA-2 , 2 capsule t.i.d. , meal ( 2700 mg STA-2 total dose per day ) Placebo Group : Placebo capsule , 2 capsule t.i.d. , meal
